ygData.subject: RE: Necro sit in
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I have heard, they have changed the initial faction standing for Gnome Necro s in Kelethin.  But even if they haven t, the plan is to litter the
ygData.messageBody:
From what I have heard, they have changed the initial faction standing for
Gnome Necro's in Kelethin. But even if they haven't, the plan is to litter
the ground with Necro corpses. They will have free binding there. They
suggest getting a level 1 Necro and going PvP with him. That way you have a
bunch of PvP necro's running around getting killed and not looting. I think
we will end up crashing the zone.

Dicey
-----Original Message-----
From: Fraal [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999 1:39 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Necro sit in


ummm My gnome Necro was KOS in Kelethin from the get go, I had to earn
faction first so this might be a bad idea unless they changed the initial
faction stuff in the last 3 months . . .

----- Original Message -----
From: Dicey
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 10:41 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Necro sit in


Someone is organizing a sit in on the Tunare server to protest Necro
nerfs.
It is on Dec. 5th at Kelethin. If you dont have a Necro on Tunare, you
can
create a Gnome Necro and run to Kelethin. for more info go here
http://www.doomguild.com/monitor/general/3187.html.

Dicey
